original_title: FLOSS Weekly Episode 804: The AI Alliance — Asimov was Right
original_content:
This week Jonathan Bennett and and Dan Lynch chat with Anthony Annunziata about Open Source AI and the AI Alliance. We get answers to our burning AI questions, and talk about the difficulty of defining what Open Source means for these large models.


https://thealliance.ai/


Did you know you can watch the live recording of the show Right on our YouTube Channel? Have someone youd like us to interview? Let us know, or contact the guest and have them contact us! Take a look at the schedule here.

Direct Download in DRM-free MP3.
If youd rather read along, heres the transcript for this weeks episode.
